What are netsales in the east region?
What is the inventory value of stores in the east region?
What are the top stores in the east region?
What are the top districts in the east region?

What are the sales by brand in the east region?

What is the inventory value of stores in the Central region?

What are the sales by brand in the WEST region?

What are the top-selling by price status?
Which store location had the highest sales this week?
pairs.ans: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(LL.LOCATION_LABEL, ' is the location with the highest weekly sales of ', FORMAT(SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]), 'C')) FROM [DASHBOARD].[STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS] SA JOIN [STORY].[LKP_LOCATION] LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD WHERE TIMEFRAME = 'WTD' GROUP BY LL.LOCATION_LABEL ORDER BY SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]) DESC;

pairs.prompt: Which store location had the highest sales this month?
pairs.ans: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(LL.LOCATION_LABEL, ' is the location with the highest MTD sales of ', FORMAT(SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]), 'C')) FROM [DASHBOARD].[STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS] SA JOIN [STORY].[LKP_LOCATION] LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD WHERE TIMEFRAME = 'MTD' GROUP BY LL.LOCATION_LABEL ORDER BY SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]) DESC;

pairs.prompt: Which store location had the highest sales this year?
pairs.ans: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(LL.LOCATION_LABEL, ' is the location with the highest YTD sales of ', FORMAT(SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]), 'C')) FROM [DASHBOARD].[STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS] SA JOIN [STORY].[LKP_LOCATION] LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD WHERE TIMEFRAME = 'YTD' GROUP BY LL.LOCATION_LABEL ORDER BY SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]) DESC;

pairs.prompt: Which store location had the highest sales this yesterday?
pairs.ans: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(LL.LOCATION_LABEL, ' is the location with the highest sales yesterday of ', FORMAT(SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]), 'C')) FROM [DASHBOARD].[STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS] SA JOIN [STORY].[LKP_LOCATION] LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD WHERE TIMEFRAME = 'DAY' GROUP BY LL.LOCATION_LABEL ORDER BY SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]) DESC;

pairs.prompt: Which are the best-selling product categories?
pairs.ans: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(LL.LOCATION_LABEL, ' is the location with the highest sales yesterday of ', FORMAT(SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]), 'C')) FROM [DASHBOARD].[STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS] SA JOIN [STORY].[LKP_LOCATION] LL ON SA.LOCATION_CD = LL.LOCATION_CD WHERE TIMEFRAME = 'DAY' GROUP BY LL.LOCATION_LABEL ORDER BY SUM(SA.[REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY]) DESC;

pairs.prompt: Which are the best-selling product categories?
pairs.ans: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT('The best selling product category is ', LC.CATEGORY_LABEL, ' with ', FORMAT(CAST(SUM([REVENUE_UNITS_TY]) AS BIGINT), '###,###,###,###,###'), ' units sold.') FROM [DASHBOARD].[STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR] SA JOIN [STORY].[LKP_CATEGORY] LC ON SA.CATEGORY_CD = LC.CATEGORY_CD GROUP BY LC.CATEGORY_LABEL ORDER BY SUM([REVENUE_UNITS_TY]) DESC;

pairs.prompt: What is the current total inventory value?
pairs.ans: SELECT CONCAT('The total current inventory value is ', FORMAT(SUM([INVENTORY_DOLLARS_TY]), 'C')) FROM [DASHBOARD].[STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR];

pairs.prompt: How many units of Long Denim were sold this month?
pairs.ans: SELECT CONCAT(FORMAT(SUM(SA.REVENUE_UNITS_TY), '###,###,###,###,###'), ' units of ', LC.CATEGORY_LABEL, ' were sold this month.') FROM [DASHBOARD].[STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS] SA JOIN [STORY].[LKP_CATEGORY] LC ON SA.CATEGORY_CD = LC.CATEGORY_CD WHERE LC.CATEGORY_LABEL = 'Long Denim' AND SA.TIMEFRAME = 'MTD' GROUP BY LC.CATEGORY_LABEL;
